body.body: What.. who's that drunk idiot who wants to come to OUR party? I suppose you can come in.. BUT, we're running low on beer! Why don't you stumble on down to the store over there and grab us some beers!
Grab us a $beersToWin pack and bring it back.  Better avoid the bums... they like to steal your beer, and then you'll have to go BACK and get MORE!
Well, what are you waiting for!?  Get moving, and don't sober up too much!

Controls:
WASD, arrow keys: movement
SPACEBAR: drink a beer
